title: Where the Flag Floats
description: Sydney, 30th January 1863Pursued through the streets of Sydney, petty thief Sam Galloway is saved by a navy deserter. However, this chance encounter leads him to a doomed ship, and a struggle to stay alive in pounding seas. Can Sam survive to recover the precious object that connects him to his father, and the family he never knew he had?
author: D.C. Grant
